entry.description: "This LC-MS/MS data represents a mixture of HeLa Cells of unknown tissue type infected with Adenovirus C serotype 5 It comprises a mixture of control (A) sampled 8 hrs after infection (with no labelling), treatment B sampled 24hrs after infection (13C SILAC labelled) and treatment C sampled 24hrs after infection (13C and 15N SILAC labelled). The primary use fo the labels is to distinguish which samples each protein came from. A high accuracy Orbitrap mass spectrometer was used with a peptide precursor mass tolerance of 10ppm and MS/MS tolerance of 0.8 Da"
